battle

Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • battle.Target

  • public abstract class Target
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to store the logic to generate a list of Fighter object that can be legal targets for a skill. Various prescribed strategies for determining valid targets are enumerated as constant Target object field values. The class also has a method for generating a costume Target object for determining valid targets.
    Author:
    Andrew M. Teller(https://github.com/AndrewMiTe)
    See Also:
    getCostumeTarget

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Target ANY_ALLY
      Allied fighters on the battlefield, including the fighter with the targeting skill.
      static Target ANY_ENEMY

      Allied fighters on the battlefield, excluding the fighter with the targeting skill.
      static Target ANYONE
      Any fighter on the battlefield.
      static Target ANYONE_ELSE
      Any fighter on the battlefield, except for the fighter with the targeting skill.
      static Target CLOSE_ALLY
      Allied fighters close to the fighter with the targeting skill that includes the fighter with the targeting skill.
      static Target CLOSE_ENEMY
      Enemy fighters close to the fighter with the targeting skill.
      static Target OTHER_CLOSE_ALLY
      Allied fighters close to the fighter with the targeting skill that excludes the fighter with the targeting skill.
      static Target SELF
      The fighter with the targeting skill.

    • Field Detail

      • SELF

        public static final Target SELF
        The fighter with the targeting skill.

      • CLOSE_ALLY

        public static final Target CLOSE_ALLY
        Allied fighters close to the fighter with the targeting skill that includes the fighter with the targeting skill. The range of close is determined by a property of the targeting unit.

      • OTHER_CLOSE_ALLY

        public static final Target OTHER_CLOSE_ALLY
        Allied fighters close to the fighter with the targeting skill that excludes the fighter with the targeting skill. The range of close is determined by a property of the targeting unit.

      • ANY_ALLY

        public static final Target ANY_ALLY
        Allied fighters on the battlefield, including the fighter with the targeting skill.

      • ANY_OTHER_ALLY

        public static final Target ANY_OTHER_ALLY
        Allied fighters on the battlefield, excluding the fighter with the targeting skill.

      • CLOSE_ENEMY

        public static final Target CLOSE_ENEMY
        Enemy fighters close to the fighter with the targeting skill. The range of close is determined by a property of the targeting unit.

      • ANY_ENEMY

        public static final Target ANY_ENEMY
        Enemy fighters on the battlefield.

      • ANYONE

        public static final Target ANYONE
        Any fighter on the battlefield.

      • ANYONE_ELSE

        public static final Target ANYONE_ELSE
        Any fighter on the battlefield, except for the fighter with the targeting skill.

    • Method Detail

      • getCostumTarget

        public static final Target getCostumTarget(java.util.function.BiFunction<Battlefield,Fighter,java.util.List<Fighter>> function)
        Instantiates and returns a Target object using the given function for returning a list of targets from the fighters on a battlefield.
        Parameters:
        function - function for solving the list of fighters that can be targeted on the battlefield from the targeting fighter's perspective.
        Returns:
        Target object using the given function in instantiation.

      • getTargets

        public abstract java.util.List<Fighter> getTargets(Battlefield battlefield,
                                                   Fighter fighter)
        Returns a list of Fighter objects chosen from fighters contained in the given battlefield. The fighter with the skill that is assumed to be targeting is taken by the method to provide a perspective.
        Parameters:
        battlefield - battlefield containing all possible targets
        fighter - fighter with the targeting skill.
        Returns:
        list of Fighter objects that can be targeted.

      • getFunction

        public java.util.function.BiFunction<Battlefield,Fighter,java.util.List<Fighter>> getFunction()
        Returns a BiFunction equvilant to the getTargets method of this object.
        Returns:
        function for solving the list of fighters that can be targeted on the battlefield from the targeting fighter's perspective.
